documents.title: About Brilliant Aesthetics
documents.content: Brilliant Aesthetics LLC is a premier medical spa in Strongsville, Ohio, founded by Kimberly Enochs-Smith, MSN, APRN, FNP-BC. With over 23 years of healthcare experience, Kimberly specializes in helping patients look and feel their best through personalized aesthetic treatments. Our medical director is Dr. Bertram Prosser, MD, ensuring all treatments meet the highest medical standards.

documents.title: Location & Contact
documents.content: Address: 11221 Pearl Road, Suite 8, Strongsville, OH 44136. Phone: (440) 732-5929. We are conveniently located off Pearl Road with easy parking available. The suite is in a modern medical office building.

documents.title: Hours of Operation
documents.content: Monday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM. Tuesday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM. Wednesday: By appointment only. Thursday: By appointment only. Friday: 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM (evening hours for busy professionals). Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM. Sunday: By appointment only. We offer flexible scheduling to accommodate your busy lifestyle.

documents.title: Neurotoxins - Botox, Dysport, Xeomin
documents.content: We offer all three FDA-approved neurotoxins for wrinkle reduction. Botox: $13/unit, typically 20-40 units for forehead and frown lines. Dysport: $4/unit, roughly 2.5-3 units of Dysport equals 1 unit of Botox. Xeomin: $12/unit, a 'naked' neurotoxin that may be preferred for patients who have developed tolerance. All neurotoxin treatments include a complimentary 2-week follow-up to ensure optimal results.

documents.title: Dermal Fillers
documents.content: We use premium Juvederm and Restylane filler families for natural-looking volume restoration. Lip Enhancement: Starting at $650/syringe with Juvederm Ultra or Restylane Kysse. Cheek Augmentation: $750-850/syringe, typically 1-2 syringes per cheek. Nasolabial Folds: $650-750/syringe. Under-eye Hollows: $700/syringe with specialized techniques for delicate areas. All filler treatments include lidocaine for comfort and a follow-up appointment.

documents.title: Chemical Peels & Skin Treatments
documents.content: We offer medical-grade chemical peels for skin rejuvenation. Light Peel (Glycolic/Lactic): $125, minimal downtime, great for first-timers. Medium Peel (TCA): $200-250, 3-5 days of peeling, excellent for sun damage and fine lines. Deep Peel (Jessner's): $275-350, more aggressive treatment for significant improvement. Package of 3 peels: 15% discount. We recommend a consultation to determine the best peel depth for your skin type and goals.

documents.title: Weight Loss Program - GLP-1 Medications
documents.content: Our medically-supervised weight loss program uses FDA-approved GLP-1 medications including Semaglutide (similar to Wegovy/Ozempic) and Tirzepatide (similar to Mounjaro/Zepbound). Starting dose: $350/month, includes medication, weekly check-ins, and nutritional guidance. Full program includes body composition analysis, metabolic assessment, and ongoing support. Initial consultation required to assess candidacy - $150 (applied to first month if enrolled). Average patients see 15-20% body weight reduction over 6-12 months.

documents.title: PDO Thread Lifts
documents.content: Non-surgical lifting and contouring using PDO (Polydioxanone) threads. Face/Jawline Threads: Starting at $1,500 for a full treatment. Brow Lift: $800-1,000. Neck Lift: $1,200-1,800. Results last 12-18 months as the threads stimulate your own collagen production. Minimal downtime - most patients return to work the next day. Kim has advanced training in thread techniques for natural-looking results.

documents.title: Booking & Deposit Policy
documents.content: We require a $50 refundable deposit for all first-time appointments. This deposit is applied toward your treatment. Rescheduling: Please provide at least 24 hours notice to reschedule without forfeiting your deposit. Same-day cancellations or no-shows will forfeit the deposit. This policy helps us serve all our patients efficiently and respect everyone's time. Book online through our patient portal or call us at (440) 732-5929.

documents.title: New Patient Experience
documents.content: For first-time patients: 1) Complete a brief intake form (available online or in-office). 2) Meet with Kim for a personalized consultation to discuss your goals and concerns. 3) Receive a customized treatment plan with options that fit your budget and timeline. 4) Same-day treatments available for many services after consultation. We believe in educating our patients so you can make informed decisions about your aesthetic journey.

documents.title: Frequently Asked Questions
documents.content: Do injections hurt? We use numbing cream and ice to minimize discomfort - most patients describe it as a slight pinch. How long do results last? Neurotoxins: 3-4 months. Fillers: 6-18 months depending on area. Can I return to work after treatment? For Botox and most fillers, yes! We recommend avoiding strenuous exercise for 24 hours. Do you offer payment plans? Yes, we offer financing through Cherry and CareCredit for larger treatments.

documents.title: Specials & Membership
documents.content: New Patient Special: First Botox treatment at $11/unit (regularly $13). Brilliant Beauty Club: Monthly membership starting at $99/month, includes discounts on all services, birthday bonus, and exclusive member events. Referral Program: Refer a friend and you both receive $25 credit toward your next treatment. Follow us on Instagram @brilliantaestheticsohio for flash sales and new service announcements.
